concept.title: Whispers of Serenity
concept.description: Guide a humble monk through treacherous landscapes, utilizing stealth, agility, and the wisdom of ancient techniques to evade menacing spirits and restore balance to corrupted sanctuaries.
concept.theme: Mystical East Asian folklore, serene natural environments contrasted with corrupted spirits, quiet contemplation.
concept.objective: To reach the end of each sacred sanctuary, purifying it by activating ancient altars, and ultimately confronting the source of the corruption.
mechanics: Stealth and Evasion: Utilize shadows, cover, and careful movement to avoid enemy line of sight. Enemies have predictable patrol patterns and detection radii.

Environmental Interaction: Manipulate the environment to create distractions, block paths, or provide new routes. Examples include pushing objects, interacting with wind chimes, or activating ancient mechanisms.
Resource Management: Manage 'Harmony' – a resource gained from safe passage and meditation, used to activate abilities and purify altars. Harmony is depleted by being detected or taking damage.
player_abilities: Silent Step: Temporarily reduce movement sound to near-zero, allowing for closer passes to enemies.
Meditative Gaze: Briefly reveal enemy patrol paths and detection zones within a limited radius, aiding in planning movement.
Spirit Whisper: Throw a small, glowing orb that temporarily distracts enemies, luring them away from the player's path.

enemies.name: Shadow Lurker
enemies.behavior: Patrols in fixed patterns, actively searches for any noise or movement within its cone of vision. Becomes more aggressive when alerted.

enemies.name: Whispering Wraith
enemies.behavior: Hovers near corrupted areas, emits a faint aura that slows the player. Will pursue the player if directly seen, but is less persistent than the Lurker. Its detection is based on proximity rather than line of sight.

enemies.name: Guardian Spirit
enemies.behavior: Stationed at key points, it has a wide detection radius and will summon other enemies if alerted. Requires careful environmental manipulation or distraction to bypass.

powerups.name: Tranquil Bloom
powerups.effect: Instantly replenishes a portion of the player's Harmony, allowing for more frequent ability usage.

powerups.name: Ephemeral Cloak
powerups.effect: Grants a temporary period of near invisibility, allowing the player to walk directly past enemies without being detected.

concept.level_progression: Levels are structured as distinct sanctuaries with increasing complexity in enemy placement, environmental puzzles, and enemy types. Completing a sanctuary unlocks the next, with a narrative unfolding through discovered lore fragments.
concept.scoring_system: Points are awarded for: reaching the end of a level quickly, purifying altars without being detected, collecting hidden lore fragments, and successfully using abilities. A 'Serenity Score' is calculated based on overall stealth and minimal detection. Bonus points for completing levels without taking any damage.
concept.visual_style: Hand-drawn 2D art with a painterly quality. Soft lighting, muted color palettes with vibrant accents for corrupted elements and interactive objects. Character animations are fluid and emphasize graceful movement.
concept.sound_theme: Ambient, atmospheric soundtrack featuring traditional East Asian instruments like the Koto, Shakuhachi, and various percussions. Sound effects are subtle and reactive, emphasizing the player's stealth. Enemy sounds are dissonant and unsettling, contrasting with the serene environment.

level_design.name: The Whispering Grove
level_design.description: A tranquil grove where ancient stones hum with a forgotten energy. Shadows dance between the trees, and watchful guardians patrol the paths. Your journey begins here, learning to blend with the environment and harness its subtle power.

objectives.description: Reach the purification altar at the grove's edge.
